name: Panchtantra
title: The Panchatantra is an ancient Indian collection of moral fables featuring animal characters.

name: Cook Book
title: Tarla Dalal's cookbook features easy and delicious Indian recipes for home cooks.

name: Mathematics Book
title: A maths book covers essential mathematical concepts and problem-solving techniques.

name: Harry Potter
title: Harry Potter is a fantasy book series about a young wizard's adventures at Hogwarts School.

name: Tinkle
title: Tinkle is a popular comic book series featuring entertaining stories and colorful characters for kids.

name: Atomic Habits
title: Atomic Habits by James Clear offers practical strategies for building good habits and breaking bad ones.

name: Rich Dad Poor Dad
title: Robert Kiyosaki teaches financial literacy through contrasting lessons from two father figures.

name: The Alchemist
title: Paulo Coelho follows a shepherd named Santiago on a transformative journey to pursue his dreams and discover his destiny.

name: Let's Learn French
title: Provides essential language skills and practical exercises for beginners to master French communication.

name: Quantum Computing Book
title: Explores the principles and applications of quantum mechanics in computing, offering insights into revolutionary technologies.
